Protein Evidence

  • Protein
  • Chart
  • MIT

Display the pie chart of protein evidence level from UniProt or neXtProt (human) in datasets.

  • dataset

    required

    dataset

  • slice_stanza

    slice flag (0,1)

<togostanza-protein_evidence dataset='DS1631_1'></togostanza-protein_evidence>

The above element will automatically embed the following Stanza in your HTML page.
